name: AI Survivors
description:
The AI has corrupted everything, except you and your trusty robot which you can swap conciousness with, and now you must fight for your life...

The goal of the game is to last as long as possible while juggling between two characters who have separate health bars, but a shared life, meaning if one dies - the game ends. 

Made in 72 hours for Wowie Jam 4. This is our first game, so it's a bit rough around the edges, but we hope you will still enjoy it nonetheless.

Credits:

JAYTOn - Pretty much all programming, UI Design

WakerLink - SFX, Music, Sprite Editing, Player Sprites, Animation, some programming help

Almost all textures were created using craiyon.com.
